did.unittitle:
Martha Cook Building (University of Michigan) publications
1916-2013
did.abstract: Women's dormitory at the University of Michigan Publications include annuals, histories, newsletters, and programs. Also contains material relating to the fiftieth anniversary celebration and to the Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group (Donor no. 5887) has been donated by the Board of Governors of the Martha Cook Building in several accessions.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the publications expected.

accessrestrict.p: The publications are open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Board of Governors of the Martha Cook Building.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Martha Cook Building (University of Michigan) publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Please consult the history found in the finding for Martha Cook Building (University of Michigan) Records.

scopecontent.p: The Martha Cook Building Publications (40 folders) include annuals, histories, newsletters, and programs as well as material relating to the fiftieth anniversary celebration and to the Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit The Publications are organized into two series: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan--Students--Social life and customs.

scopecontent.p: The Unit Publications series contains a long run of Martha Cook annuals, which include photographs of the residents and descriptions of the activities taking place in the residence hall. These annual yearbooks cover the period from 1916 to1941, 1975/76, and 2000/01. There are histories, including the memoirs of Olive Chernow, who was a resident at Martha Cook when she was a student and later served as director of Martha Cook Building from 1973 to 1979. This series also contains a brief run of the newsletter The Cookie Press.

did.unittitle: Life and Times in Martha Cook Building, 1941
Martha Cook Annual: A Panorama of Life at Martha Cook, 1940
Articles about Martha Cook, 1973-1975 and undated
Constitution, By-laws and Regulations of the Martha Cook Building, 1925-1932
The Martha Cook Building by Wystan Stevens, 1976
The Martha Cook Building: Its History and Traditions by Elaine Macklin and Tenney Chamberlain, 1970
My Years at the Martha Cook Building by Olive Chernow

scopecontent.p: The Sub-Unit Publications include publications describing the Fiftieth Anniversary Celebration and the activities of the Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit.

did.unittitle: The Martha Cook Building: Fiftieth Anniversary,1915-1965 , 1965
Martha Cook Alumnae Association of Detroit
